metadata.title: CVE-2023-34624 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered htmlcleaner thru = 2.28 allows attackers to cause adenial of service or other unspecified impacts via crafted object that usescyclic dependencies.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-34624` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libhtmlcleaner-java - 2.24-1+deb11u1build0.22.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libhtmlcleaner-java package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.24-1+deb11u1build0.22.04.1').
